name: Wandera
description:
Wandera’s pioneering web gateway for mobile provides organizations with Enterprise Mobile Security and Data Management. 

A recognized leader in the space, Wandera’s security solution includes Mobile Threat Defense, designed to identify vulnerabilities and protect devices from targeted mobile attacks. Powerful Content Filtering features extend this protection by allowing organizations to manage unapproved device usage and reduce data exposures on a proactive basis. 

Wandera’s Data Management services harness a similar set of technologies to give businesses control of their mobile data usage. With unparalleled visibility into how work-assigned devices are being used, admins can create bespoke policies that reduce data consumption, prevent bill shock and improve productivity.

jobs.title: Technical Account Manager
jobs.description:
Wandera are looking to hire a Technical Account Manager to join our growing team to help support and build a world class customer support organization. You will ideally have been part of a support organization in your previous roles where you will have demonstrated leadership and change and excelled at ensuring customers are given superb levels of service along with good technical skills ideally in the mobile device space. You will have excellent English and written grammar as you will be interacting with the business and our global customer base on a day-to-day basis.

RESPONSIBILITIES & SKILLS

• Proven ability in delivering global cloud-based services with a project management- oriented mindset and with excellent levels of customer satisfaction.
• Ability to understand a customer’s technical requirements and advise on the appropriate delivery methodology for the Wandera Secure Mobile Gateway platform
• A strong technical background to diagnose customer problems and convey details back to the business through a deep technical understanding of our service.
• Superb communication/social skills to engage with both technical and non-technical contacts across all mediums but primarily email, telephone, chat and video conferencing.
• Attention to detail while managing multiple problems though to completion with high levels of customer satisfaction.
• An ability to produce metrics/reports/dashboards to prove how successful you and the team are.  

YOU & YOUR EXPERIENCE
￼
￼• You will be excited by engaging with a global customer base.
• A passion to own and improve our user experience to be world class.  
• Commitment to see projects and problems through to completion.  
• Bring ideas and solutions to our team and have conviction in your proposals.  
• A great work ethic that leads by example with second-to-none customer service.  
• A degree or similar is desirable but 1-3 years’ experience in a technical account
management-based role is essential.
• Experience with mobile technology including mobile networks, devices and operating
systems is an advantage.
